summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of Robert C. Petersen. The documents focus on local agency checks conducted by the FBI on Ivan Marti, Blanca Marti, and Manuel Marti in San Juan, Puerto Rico. These checks were conducted around October 1, 1968, and aimed to gather information on the Marti family. The documents do not provide any information about Robert C. Petersen or his involvement in any related events.
significance: Based on the provided documents, Robert C. Petersen has no significance in the JFK context.
